name: Captain Flapper
description:
Ahoy Captain!

Welcome to Captain Flapper, a thrilling endless runner game featuring the old captain's ship sailing through the vast and dangerous ocean. In this game, you must navigate through treacherous waters and avoid mighty monsters that lurk beneath the waves.

 Can you make it through the endless ocean and beat your high score?

Controls:

[mouse click] - jumping 

---------------------------

Designer: Tomer Gazit

Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

 Art & Interaction course, Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
